scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint Christopher carrying the Christ Child across a body of water. Saint Christopher, a large bearded man wearing a red cloak over a white tunic, wades through the water, leaning on a tall staff. The Christ Child, depicted with a halo, sits on Saint Christopher's shoulders, holding a golden orb and raising one hand in blessing. In the background, a rocky cliff face is visible, with a hooded figure holding a lantern and a staff standing near its base. The landscape includes a body of water with stylized waves and a grassy bank with yellow foliage on the left.
